trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_SEQ_00<tab>Eyaney seems concerned for Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_TODO_00<tab>Search for Krile at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the affable local.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Krile again.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Eyaney.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_100_001<tab>Guests are always welcome in Treno. I hope you're enjoying your time here!
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_EYANEY_000_001<tab>Krile is taking a while... Being new to the city, if something were to happen, she wouldn't know where to go for help.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_EYANEY_000_002<tab>Would you check on her? She started off in the direction of town hall.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_EYANEY_000_011<tab>Thankfully, I can confirm she's in no immediate danger─I got the detector running again just now, and it hasn't picked up any new signals.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Though there are several diminutive folk about, none appears to be Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Perhaps one of them spotted her passing through...
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_031<tab>You're looking a mite lost there, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Aught I can help with?
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_Q1_000_032<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_A1_000_001<tab>Have you seen a woman in a yellow hood?
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_A1_000_002<tab>I'm looking for a Milalla friend of mine...
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_033<tab>A Milalla? Seen quite a few of them today, heh. But if she's a friend of yours...
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_034<tab>I presume you mean Krile. Had a grand old chat with her earlier.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_035<tab>Not to mention she saved my hide! Can't believe I missed that lightning sprite till it was right on top of me...
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_036<tab>It's thanks to her that I got out unscathed.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_037<tab>Bit awkward, striking up a conversation after that. And it'd been a while since I talked to anyone I haven't known my whole life...
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_038<tab>She's a kind lass. Good at putting folks at ease, like Miayli. I quite enjoyed telling her about the city.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_039<tab>When we were done chatting, she went off towards the canal. Had a touch of melancholy about her, though, and I wasn't sure why...
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_040<tab>Didn't think it was something I said, but I knew that if it was, saying more wouldn't help. So I let her go.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_041<tab>I reckon she'd welcome the company of a good friend right now.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_RESIDENT05431_000_051<tab>Good place for pondering, that canal. Maybe that's why she went that way.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_KRILE_000_061<tab>Thank you for listening. I'm a little less afraid to face the answer now, whatever it may be.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_KRILE_000_062<tab>And when I find it, I hope you'll be there.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_KRILE_000_063<tab>...But we've kept Eyaney waiting long enough. Let's hurry back.

TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_KRILE_000_071<tab>Trifling though it was, I feel that the work we've done has helped me gain a better understanding of Treno. The countless small actions taken by myriad people every day are what make a place what it is, after all.
TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_EYANEY_000_081<tab>I'm glad you're both back safe and sound!

TEXT_KINGMJ106_05431_EYANEY_000_082<tab>Now we can relax until my brother does the same. With your friend escorting him, he can't get himself into too much trouble...unless he tumbles down the stairs into town again, I suppose.
